sprintGoal: Foundation infrastructure and authentication system ready for feature development

tasks.title: Initialize backend project structure
tasks.description: Set up Node.js + TypeScript + Express project with proper folder structure, configuration files, and development tooling
acceptanceCriteria: Node.js 20 LTS project initialized with TypeScript 5+
Express server structure with modular routing
ESLint and Prettier configured with consistent rules
Environment configuration using dotenv with validation

technicalNotes.scripts: dev, build, start, lint, format, test
technicalNotes.dependencies: express, typescript, zod, dotenv, winston, helmet, cors

tasks.title: Configure Prisma ORM and PostgreSQL connection
tasks.description: Set up Prisma with PostgreSQL database, configure connection pooling, and prepare for schema migration
acceptanceCriteria: Prisma schema file created with basic structure

tasks.title: Implement complete database schema with Prisma
tasks.description: Create comprehensive Prisma schema covering all 50+ tables across Users, News, Forum, Jobs, LLM Guide, and Platform domains
acceptanceCriteria: Users domain: 10 tables (users, profiles, oauth, sessions, skills, etc.)
News domain: 8 tables (articles, categories, tags, bookmarks, etc.)
Forum domain: 15 tables (topics, replies, votes, reputation, badges, etc.)
Jobs domain: 10 tables (jobs, companies, applications, matches, etc.)
LLM Guide domain: 4 tables (models, use cases, glossary)
Platform domain: 7 tables (notifications, follows, messages, analytics, etc.)

technicalNotes.naming: snake_case for database, camelCase for Prisma models

tasks.title: Create database seed script with initial data
tasks.description: Implement seed script to populate database with essential data for development: LLM models, categories, admin user, sample content
acceptanceCriteria: 47+ LLM models seeded with complete data
Seed script is idempotent (can run multiple times)
Command: npm run seed executes successfully

technicalNotes.models: GPT-4 Turbo, Claude 3 Opus, Gemini Pro, Llama 3, Mistral, etc.
technicalNotes.data: Use realistic data, not Lorem Ipsum

tasks.title: Set up Redis for caching and sessions
tasks.description: Configure Redis for session management, rate limiting, and caching with local and cloud setup
acceptanceCriteria: Cache wrapper functions created (get, set, del, expire)
Error handling for Redis failures (graceful degradation)

tasks.title: Implement core middleware stack
tasks.description: Create and configure essential Express middleware: error handling, validation, logging, CORS, security headers, rate limiting
acceptanceCriteria: Global error handler middleware with consistent format
Rate limiting per route group (auth: 5/15min, api: 100/min)

technicalNotes.logging: Winston with daily rotate file transport

tasks.title: Implement JWT authentication system
tasks.description: Build complete JWT-based authentication with access tokens, refresh tokens, and session management
acceptanceCriteria: Access tokens: 15min expiry, signed with RS256
Refresh tokens: 30 days expiry, stored in HTTPOnly cookie
Rate limiting: 5 login attempts per 15min per IP

technicalNotes.tokens: Access: JWT in header, Refresh: HTTPOnly cookie

tasks.title: Implement email verification flow
tasks.description: Build email verification system with token generation, email sending, and verification endpoint
acceptanceCriteria: Email service configured (SendGrid or AWS SES)
Tokens stored in database with expiration
Verified users can access protected routes
Unverified users redirected to verification page
Rate limit: 3 resend requests per hour
Clear error messages for expired/invalid tokens

technicalNotes.tokens: Stored in sessions table with type='email_verification'

tasks.title: Implement password reset flow
tasks.description: Build complete password reset system with email flow, token validation, and password update
acceptanceCriteria: Rate limit: 3 requests per hour per email
Success email sent after password change
All active sessions invalidated after password reset

technicalNotes.invalidation: Delete all user sessions on password change

tasks.title: Implement OAuth authentication (Google, LinkedIn, GitHub)
tasks.description: Add OAuth 2.0 authentication flow for Google, LinkedIn, and GitHub providers using Passport.js
acceptanceCriteria: OAuth provider data stored in oauth_providers table
Account linking for existing email users
Email verified automatically for OAuth users
Profile data synced from OAuth provider

technicalNotes.credentials: Store client ID/secret in environment variables
technicalNotes.linking: Link by email if user exists
technicalNotes.sync: Sync avatar, name from OAuth profile

tasks.title: Implement 2FA with TOTP
tasks.description: Add two-factor authentication support using Time-based One-Time Passwords (TOTP)
acceptanceCriteria: QR code generation for authenticator apps
Backup codes stored hashed in database

technicalNotes.library: speakeasy for TOTP, qrcode for QR generation

tasks.title: Set up Bull queue for background jobs
tasks.description: Configure Bull (Redis-based queue) for handling background jobs: emails, notifications, calculations
acceptanceCriteria: Email queue created for async email sending
Job retry logic (3 attempts with backoff)
Development: single process, Production: separate workers

tasks.title: Initialize frontend project with React and Vite
tasks.description: Set up React 18+ with TypeScript, Vite build tool, folder structure, and essential configurations
acceptanceCriteria: Vite project initialized with React 18+ and TypeScript
React Router v6 installed and configured

tasks.title: Configure Tailwind CSS and UI component library
tasks.description: Set up Tailwind CSS for styling and install UI component library (Radix UI or MUI)
acceptanceCriteria: Custom Tailwind theme with brand colors
UI library installed (Radix UI or MUI v5)
Base components: Button, Input, Card, Modal
Tailwind IntelliSense working in VS Code

technicalNotes.fonts: Inter for sans-serif, JetBrains Mono for code

tasks.title: Set up TanStack Query for data fetching
tasks.description: Configure TanStack Query (React Query) for server state management, caching, and data fetching
acceptanceCriteria: Default query options set (staleTime, cacheTime, retry)
API client created (axios or fetch wrapper)
Query client configured with sensible defaults
Example query hook created and tested

tasks.title: Set up Zustand for client state management
tasks.description: Configure Zustand for managing client-side application state (UI state, user preferences)
acceptanceCriteria: Auth store created for user session
UI store created for theme, sidebar state

tasks.title: Configure internationalization (i18n)
tasks.description: Set up react-i18next for multi-language support (Dutch and English)
acceptanceCriteria: Translation files for English and Dutch

tasks.title: Create base layout components and navigation
tasks.description: Build foundational layout components: Header, Footer, Sidebar, Navigation, and responsive layouts
acceptanceCriteria: Header component with logo, navigation, user menu
Footer component with links and social
Main layout component with responsive grid
Navigation menu with active state highlighting

technicalNotes.navigation: React Router NavLink for active states
technicalNotes.menu: Radix UI Dialog or MUI Drawer for mobile menu

tasks.title: Set up Docker Compose for local development
tasks.description: Create Docker Compose configuration for running PostgreSQL, Redis, and application services locally

tasks.title: Configure CI/CD pipeline with GitHub Actions
tasks.description: Set up automated testing, linting, and deployment pipeline using GitHub Actions
acceptanceCriteria: Workflow runs on push to main and pull requests
Backend: lint, type-check, test, build steps
Frontend: lint, type-check, test, build steps
Deployment workflow for staging (auto-deploy on main)

tasks.title: Set up Sentry for error tracking
tasks.description: Configure Sentry for error and performance monitoring on both backend and frontend
acceptanceCriteria: Sentry account created and project configured
Source maps uploaded for better stack traces
User context attached to errors (when authenticated)
Test error triggers verified in Sentry dashboard

tasks.title: Write comprehensive README and setup documentation
tasks.description: Create detailed documentation for project setup, development workflow, and deployment
acceptanceCriteria: README.md with project overview and features

technicalNotes.links: Link to API docs, database schema docs

tasks.title: Test end-to-end foundation setup
tasks.description: Verify complete foundation setup by testing all systems: database, auth, frontend, deployment
acceptanceCriteria: Docker Compose brings up all services
Backend server starts and responds to health check
Frontend dev server starts and loads
OAuth flows work for all providers

technicalNotes.checklist: Use acceptance criteria as test checklist

deliverables: Seeded database with LLM models and sample data
Frontend project with routing, styling, state management
